amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funds for the Neighborhood Reinvestment Corporation by $12.3 million and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funding for the Neighborhood Reinvestment Corporation by $12.3 million and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A036) Failed by recorded vote: 172 - 250 (Roll no. 432).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A036) Failed by recorded vote: 172 - 250 (Roll no. 432).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A036) offered by Mr. Broun (GA).
